I click on "Create new account"

elements.name: Successful account creation

steps.name: I fill in the "Username" field with "testfddfghfg_28"
I fill in the "Email" field with "alex7@gmail.com"
I fill in the "Password" field with "12345Az"
I fill in the "Confirm Password" field with "12345Az"
I fill in the "First Name" field with "Alex"
I fill in the "Last Name" field with "Lavar"

I select "Marocco" from the "Country" dropdown
I fill in the "City" field with "Rabat"

I fill in the "State / Province / Region" field with "Rabat"

name: User Registration
description:
As a customer,
  I want to sign up to the application,
  So that I have an account created with my personal information that I can use to login to the application.
